From these sources, we confirm that the Walt Disney World Resort is located in Florida, USA.

```markdown
| Park                | Location       | Owning Entity/Company           | Attendance (2023) |
|---------------------|---------------|---------------------------------|-------------------|
| Walt Disney World Resort | Florida, USA | The Walt Disney Company         | 22,000,000         |
| Universal Studios Japan | Osaka, Japan  | Universal Parks & Resorts       | 14,000,000        |
| Disneyland Park     | California, USA | The Walt Disney Company         | 16,500,000         |
| Tokyo DisneySea    | Tokyo, Japan   | The Walt Disney Company         | 12,000,000         |
| Busch Gardens Williamsburg | Virginia, USA | Anheuser-Busch Companies        | 10,000,000        |
```
